Security Speedcast December 2018 to Present Lead the design implementation operation and maintenance of the Information Security Management System based on the ISOIEC 27000 series standards including certification against ISO 27001 Promote awareness of security issues to ensure sound security principles are reflected in the organizations vision and goals Provide engineering support for cybersecurity infrastructure Proactively collaborates with the IT department and related business units to increase system security document system architecture and define longterm design strategies Manager of IT Infrastructure and Operations NorthStar Midstream February 2017 to November 2018 Reporting to the SVP of Finance and Administration responsible for planning directing and coordinating
